name: The Shape?
description:
The Shape?

Use your brain to match your shape with hole shape on the wall before you hit it. Upgrade your "Power Up" to help you in this fun and brain sharpening game. 

Bored with "Casual Mode"?. You can also play this game in "Survival Mode" that will challenge you to become the longest survival runner.

Feature:

  • Unlimited stages
  • Power-up system
  • Survival mode
  • Four different world themes
  • Fun music (credits in game info)
Feedbacks and Suggestions

Let me know in the comment section below if you have any feedback or suggestions that can help improve this game or anything.

You can also join our Discord server in https://discord.gg/5wkD4ja7rH, you can ask anything.
